articles.author: hello@smashingmagazine.com (Eric Bailey)

articles.author: hello@smashingmagazine.com (Kirill Myshkin)
articles.description: In JavaScript, it‚Äôs natural to reach for timers when something is to happen on time. articles.title: Web Design Done Well: Delightful Data Visualization Examples

articles.author: hello@smashingmagazine.com (Leonardo Losoviz)
